item.title: Shuriken: Node
item.description: Shuriken: Node Shuriken:Node is a recently released box on Vulnhub by TheCyb3rW0lf. It is rated as an easy/medium difficulty box. Below are some hints if you get stuck and a full walkthrough for this box. Click on the title to expand each section below. Hints Initial Foothold Hints What technologies are being utilized on the main website? Are there any vulnerabilities for this technology?
